homePage.title: Leading Manufacturer of Rolling Rolls in Ukraine

aboutFactory.title: About the Factory
paragraphs: PJSC 'Dnipropetrovsk Rolling Rolls Plant' is a Ukrainian asset of the international Group 'Dniprootehservis'.
The plant was founded in 1896 and today is one of the largest producers of cast iron rolling rolls for long, tubular, and flat hot rolling mills.

The enterprise has a full production cycle. Cast iron rolling rolls with the trademark of our enterprise are known to metallurgists of almost all the largest transnational companies in the markets of Ukraine, CIS countries, the EU, and far abroad.

PJSC DRRP is certified under the quality management system according to the requirements of the international standard EN ISO 9001:2015 and guarantees the supply of high-quality products that meet all necessary norms and requirements, offering excellent operational performance.

contacts.title: Contacts

listContacts.title: Address
listContacts.description: Yakhnenskivska Street, 2, Dnipro, Dnipropetrovsk Region, 49025, Ukraine

contacts.descriptionContact: For any inquiries, please contact us using the details provided above. We are available from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday. Email inquiries are processed within 24 hours.

lyttyaMetaluPage.heading: Casting
lyttyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Casting for All Needs ‚Äî Reliability, Precision, and Quality!
lyttyaMetaluPage.description: Looking for professionals to produce high-quality metal products? We specialize in metal casting of any complexity for various industries, from mechanical engineering to construction. With modern equipment and advanced technologies, we ensure the production of parts that meet the highest standards of quality and precision.

infoCard.title: Perfection and Long Service Life of Cast Products
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of metal casting services, including the production of complex parts for various industries. Thanks to our innovative solutions, you receive products with flawless precision, exceptional reliability, and long service life.

infoCard.title: Innovative Casting Technologies. Our capabilities include:

list.description: Low-pressure casting of high-temperature steels and non-ferrous metals

infoCard.title: Full Production Cycle
infoCard.description: We provide all stages, from the development of the technological process to the delivery of finished products. This ensures you receive products that meet the highest quality standards.

infoCard.title: Wide Selection of Materials
infoCard.description: We work with various types of metals, including high-alloy steels and non-ferrous alloys, to ensure the perfect result for any project.
